name: Shane Idleman
description:
Shane Idleman ( - )
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Shane Idleman in mp3 format. Shane Idleman is the founder and lead pastor of Westside Christian Fellowship, in Lancaster, Ca. His sermons, books, articles, and radio program have sparked change in the lives of many. Today, as we continually drift away in a current of moral decline and relativism, many believe that the battle is too advanced and that we cannot make a difference. Shane, however, believes that we can, and offers his books as contributions to that commitment.
Shane’s ministry has sparked change in the lives of many. He’s calling families, marriages, and the country back to the biblical principles that once made America prized among nations. His bold stance has led to speaking engagements at some of the largest churches in the nation.

sermons.title: A Wake Up Call To Men In The Church
sermons.description: We are in desperate need of genuine leadership-broken, humble men-men who are not afraid to admit that they need God; men who are more worried about prayer than about status and recognition; men who petition God rather than position themselves. The state of the family today is disheartening. Men have largely forsaken their God-given role as spiritual leaders in their homesâ€¦that, no one can deny.

sermons.title: Wilt Thou Not Revive Us Again?” A Must Hear Message!
sermons.description: A powerful message on repentance for the churches in America. This is a current message for the current need in the churches to turn from their sins and trust in Christ afresh. Revival is not an option it is a necessity.
